name: Chris Scott
description: I am a simple person that believes in happiness.I try to be happy no matter the situation that come my way,I try to make people around me happy too in my own little way.I am real easy person to talk to and a loving and outgoing person.I enjoy playing sax which I do often at my leisure time. I like watching movies in my room or Cabin, I like swimming, listening to music and dance to any kind of music, I sing, sailing, going bowling and also a good cook. I am a family oriented person
